code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ArticleTable=_ref=>{let{articles,setArticles}=_ref;const deleteArticle=async id=>{try{await fetch("https://invix-backend-group-work.onrender.comapi/v1/articles/".concat(id),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}});setArticles(articles.filter(article=>article.id!==id));}catch(error){console.error('Error deleting article:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"articleTable",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Articles"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:articles.map(article=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:article.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:article.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:article.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:article.user}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:article.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteArticle(article.id),children:"Delete"})})]},article.id))})]})]});};export default ArticleTable;
